channel.title: Need mac help running spawnscape 614 source!
channel.description: hey! so im on a mac and no one can even tell me how to run spawns cape on a mac.. iv meet kids that do it but all of them are stuck up and wont teach me how to do it so im seeing if anyone will help me any way thanks for reading i hope someone can help me i hate being stuck on one thing i cant even get it running and iv been looking to how to run spawnscape 614 on a mac and i cant do that to so please if you can teach me how to do any one of them that would help so much! MUST BE ABULE TO SKYPE OR TEAMVEWER OR TALK ON XAT OR THE IRC CHAT! DONT WANT TO PM TRO MOPARSCAPE TO SLOW!

item.title: Need mac help running spawnscape 614 source!
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Convert the batch file into a shell script.

This site should help a bit.

Read full topic

item.description:

hey! so im on a mac and no one can even tell me how to run a 718 on a mac… iv meet kids that do it but all of them are stuck up and wont teach me how to do it so im seeing if anyone will help me any way thanks for reading i hope someone can help me i hate being stuck on one thing i cant even get it running and iv been looking to how to run spawnscape 614 on a mac and i cant do that to so please if you can teach me how to do any one of them that would help so much!
[/quote]
HEY! I run and make private servers on my mac! I’ve run everything from 194 - 742! Pm me for specific help[/quote]

why make another topic?
